remarks:
Logical OR inside and outside of substitution are equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2002.) 

---

 Logical OR inside and outside of substitution are equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2002.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 3-Feb-2018.)
statement: sbor $p |- ( [ y / x ] ( ph \/ ps ) <-> ( [ y / x ] ph \/ [ y / x ] ps ) ) $.
